info.description: An option for informational text about the setting.

flex-direction.description: Determines how flex items are arranged within the flex container by specifying the main axis and direction. Valid values are row (default), row-reverse, column, and column-reverse.

flex-wrap.description: Specifies whether flex items are confined to a single line or can flow onto multiple lines. If wrapping is allowed, it defines the stacking direction of the lines. Valid values are nowrap (default), wrap, and wrap-reverse.

row-gap.description: Defines the size of the gap between the rows of a wrapped flex container.

column-gap.description: Defines the size of the gap between flex items.

gap.description: Shorthand for row-gap and column-gap. Defines the gaps between flex items.

justify-content.description: Defines the alignment of flex items along the main axis of the flex container. Valid values are flex-start (default), flex-end, start, end, left, right, center, space-between, space-around and space-evenly.

align-items.description: Defines the alignment of flex items along the cross axis of the flex container. Valid values are stretch (default), flex-start / start / self-start, flex-end / end / self-end, center and baseline.

align-content.description: Defines the distribution of space between and around flex items along the cross axis. Valid values are stretch, flex-start / start, flex-end / end, center, space-between, space-around, and space-evenly.

flex-grow.description: Defines the flex grow factor of a flex item, determining how much of the available space in the flex container the item should occupy.

flex-shrink.description: Defines the flex shrink factor of a flex item, determining how much the item should reduce in size compared to the other flex items when space is insufficient.

flex-basis.description: Defines the initial main size of a flex item, determining the size of the content-box unless otherwise specified by box-sizing.

width.description: Defines the width of an item.

min-width.description: Defines the minimum width of an item.

max-width.description: Defines the maximum width of an item.

height.description: Defines the height of an item.

min-height.description: Defines the minimum height of an item.

max-height.description: Defines the maximum height of an item.

padding.description: Shorthand that defines the padding on all four sides of an element.

padding-top.description: Defines the padding on the top side of an element.

padding-right.description: Defines the padding on the right side of an element.

padding-bottom.description: Defines the padding on the bottom side of an element.

padding-left.description: Defines the padding on the left side of an element.

padding-block-start.description: Defines the logical block start padding of an element, translating to physical padding based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

padding-block-end.description: Defines the logical block end padding of an element, translating to physical padding based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

padding-block.description: Shorthand for padding-block-start and padding-block end. Defines the logical block start and end padding of an element, translating to physical padding based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

padding-inline-start.description: Defines the logical inline start padding of an element, translating to physical padding based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

padding-inline-end.description: Defines the logical inline end padding of an element, translating to physical padding based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

padding-inline.description: Shorthand that defines the logical inline start and end padding of an element, translating to physical padding based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

margin.description: Shorthand that defines the margin on all four sides of an element.

margin-top.description: Defines the margin on the top side of an element.

margin-right.description: Defines the margin on the right side of an element.

margin-bottom.description: Defines the margin on the bottom side of an element.

margin-left.description: Defines the margin on the left side of an element.

margin-block-start.description: Defines the logical block start margin of an element, translating to physical margin based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

margin-block-end.description: Defines the logical block end margin of an element, translating to physical margin based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

margin-block.description: Shorthand that defines the logical block start and end margins of an element, translating to physical margin based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

margin-inline-start.description: Defines the logical inline start margin of an element, translating to physical margin based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

margin-inline-end.description: Defines the logical inline end margin of an element, translating to physical margin based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.

margin-inline.description: Shorthand that defines both the logical inline start and end margins of an element, translating to physical margin based on the element's writing mode, text direction, and text orientation.
